about_the_game:
Light In Blood is a thrilling asymmetric action-horror game that immerses you in a dark world where fears and sins battle for dominance. In tense 1v4 matches, you’ll choose to play as a horrifying nightmare or a survivor with unique abilities, creating a dynamic and strategic gameplay experience.

Backstory:

In Light In Blood, survivors are people in comas who lived lives filled with good deeds but also committed grave sins. They are given a final chance to either return to life by winning the competition or remain forever in the shadows. Each nightmare embodies the fears and sins of the survivors' pasts.

Key Features:


  • Unique Characters: Each character has distinct abilities that influence their play style. Characters are balanced to ensure fair and competitive gameplay.
  • Interactive Maps: Maps have a base layout with randomly spawned windows, blocked walls, electrical panels, and generators. These elements create new tactical opportunities and affect strategy in each match.
  • Voice Chat and Pings: Coordinate with your team using voice chat and pings for effective communication. Use commands like “come here,” “I’m going there,” “rescue him,” “help,” “I see the nightmare,” “found a generator,” and “found a panel.”
  • Competitive and Casual Modes: Light In Blood offers both a competitive mode with a ranking and title system and a casual mode for a more relaxed gameplay experience.

Gameplay:

Immerse yourself in Light In Blood, where you can play as a nightmare aiming to hunt down survivors or as a survivor striving to complete objectives and find a way to escape. Each match requires strategic thinking and quick reactions to either win or survive in challenging conditions.

For Whom:

Light In Blood is perfect for fans of action and horror games looking for new tactical challenges and an immersive atmosphere. If you enjoy intense games with survival and strategy elements, Light In Blood offers countless thrilling moments.

Add Light In Blood to your Wishlist today and be the first to experience the thrill and challenge of the hunt!
